about_the_game:
This is a digital artbook in PDF format which contains over 50 pages of the history of making Path of Kami Journey Begins. The book contains the behind-the-scenes making of the game which includes scrapped art, concept art for characters, NPCs, collectibles, and more.

Learn additional information about the art direction, why certain decisions were made, and more through developer notes that can only be found in this book!
